title: Aurelion Sol (REWORK SUGGESTION)
body:
Aurelion Sol....great concept, effective but boring to play. I noticed people played him for the 1st 2 months but now I don't see the character being used at all. I've heard others complain about how bored they were using the character though he was so effective in the game. Free to play came around and I tried him......needless to say....bored to tears. 

May suggest for fun factor a slight change:

Passive: Comet of Legend- takes effect after moving in the same direction for 4 sec.

**Q: Formations of the Stars-   3 formations**
Toggle by pressing Q that changes the release effect of E 

Cooldown: 5 sec
1. **Center of the Universe**: Circular motion around epicenter
2. **Triangular**: Stationary in a triangle formation of front: left, right and 1 behind the dragon
3. **Firestorm**: 3 stars iin front of dragon spins around the epicenter......  a 4th star 

W: Voice of Light 

**E: Star Fire!!!**
Cooldown: 2.5 sec to recreate each star once the ability has been fully used.

1. Center of the Universe > **Celestial Expansion **   (High-Mid Damage)
2. Triangular > **Comet Descend**: "automatically" shoot in rapid succession the stars into the sky.  2 seconds later the stars descend  exploding into radius blasts releasing area of effect hits  (Low-damage)
3. Firestorm > **Fireballs**: shoots stars forward a short range one at a time with each button press (Mid-damage)

R: Starsurge


I DONT WANT THE KIT TO CHANGE BUT GIVE MORE OPTIONS WITH THE STAR FORMATION

replies.body:
Aurelion is perfectly fine. Some people just cant figure out how to play him properly.
He does not have balance or counterplay issues, has a complex and interesting kit, and a unique niche. 

No need to turn him into another generic button-masher mage. If you want to play that, jump on the syndra "otp" wagon.

I told you no one was playing Aurielion Sol......so they already started the rework!!!!

Whoa! calm down.....lets have a coke and a smile. I'm saying keep the powers the same but just add an option with the star formation.
Obviously you love the character so your passionate...... I played him and I know others that have too. They mostly expressed their concerns so I expressed the concern on the board.

Who do you main and what do you like about that character???

I barely play aurelion, i am just stating there is no need for a rework that will require all sorts of rebalance and effectively create an entirely new champion.

Do you actually play him? If you do, you would know that this would completely change his combos, playstyle and role. There is just no reason to do it.

i think Jinx is a fun character!!! Kalista is fun until they dumbed her down. 
Jarvin, Yasuo, Kennen and Vi........... those are examples of fun characters.
I find Sol to be an interesting case; he's not particularly flashy or bursty in the ways that make most champs "fun", yet I still find him rather satisfying to play.
People already play him, he was being played a bunch at worlds. Being boring is an opinion, he's broken in the right hands.

You're right .....its an opinion. I remembered when someone played him in team fights we were successful thanks to the character. SO.... I would beg people to play with him and everyone I asked usually gave the same response.

They didn't want to play him because he was boring. When I played I kind of felt the same.

You have a point CHROMA. 

I just wanted to really wanted to like the character and I don't.
I feel like its basically keep your stars alignment straight for most of the kit. 

At least with adc's you shoot with variations of what and how you shoot.
Aurelion doesn't have that variation.....its a mini game of star alignment with push back feature, the flying is pointless to me because you can get knocked out of it so easily. 

But to each its own.

He is in a good spot so there is no need for a rework. Learn to use his kit and if you execute it just right you can carry games. And his kit btw was made to help snowball other lanes, your kit is made to not even help roam.

I'm not saying he is bad ....im saying that the fun factor is not there. He's not a fun champion but he gets the job done well. 

So do you "enjoy" playing him?!
I do enjoy playing him. His kit isn't boring in anyway. When you have a star as big as your screen or kill someone with your Fus Ro Dah it's always fun.
